channel.title: How to make a 317 with Torva, Chaotics, AGS etc
channel.description: Anyone know how I can add Chaotics to a 317 server? Am I not allowed? Is it possible? Thanks, sorry i'm new at this! BTW I already have my client and source I just want to add new weapons into it.

item.title: How to make a 317 with Torva, Chaotics, AGS etc
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You will need to find the object models and load them into your server then define the item definitions where appropriate, then you will need to edit your server to treat them as weapons and whatnot. You can probably find these just about anywhere, try Google.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a 317 with Torva, Chaotics, AGS etc

item.title: How to make a 317 with Torva, Chaotics, AGS etc
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Andersmulle2, post:3, topic:539791”][quote author=JGX link=topic=658634.msg4405431#msg4405431 date=1391824776]
It’s easy to do. This is the wrong section though. Try again in the correct section and maybe someone will help.
[/quote]This isn’t really the wrong section… Adding items is mostly related to the client.[/quote]It was in the wrong section before I moved it.

Read full topic
